name: Simple Sonic Fan-game
description:
Simple Sonic Fan-gameWelcome!

This upload to Itch.io is for a project that I made for a school assignment.

I had been informed that a lot of friends and people might have wanted to play this so I am uploading it for everyone to enjoy!

Reminder; I did not create Sonic so all rights and credits go to SEGA for their soundtracks, effects, sprites and series!

Besides all that junk, enjoy!
